content: this design reminds me of the dual helix wind sculpture in our front garden we regularly enjoy watching its gentle twisting and spinning as the soft breeze passes it is such a peaceful and calming way to spend some quiet time and reflect these stranded colourwork socks are worked toe up with a rounded wedge toe and with a heel flap and gusset the instructions for the construction of the socks are written and the colour work pattern is both written and charted a low vision accessible version of this pattern are also available this version includes 24 point arial all black text no italics no columns or tables and fully written instructions there are charts included but the charts are not needed to complete the pattern thank you to iriknit1 shahmallow condichick eternalknitter elchkitty rannapiiga1 keerthi3031 1morerow and other testers a huge thanks also to condichick yarnymama and yalta for their ongoing valued advice guidance feedback and encouragement
